message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 3-9-3, translated into en
data:
Definition:

The mortality rate attributed to unintentional poisoning as defined as the number of deaths of unintentional poisonings in a year, divided by the population, and multiplied by 100 000.

Concepts:

Mortality rate in the country from unintentional poisonings per year. The ICD-10 codes corresponding to the indicator includes X40, X43, X46-X48, X49.
